General.Name: Guangzhou Grandbuy Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Grandbuy Co., Ltd. primarily operates department stores in China. It also operates shopping and professional stores; rents property; and acts as a wholesale agent, as well as engages in online shopping business. The company is headquartered in Guangzhou, China. Guangzhou Grandbuy Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Guangzhou Commercial Investment Holding Group Co., Ltd.
